Trade/Device Name(s): Easy Step Blood Glucose Monitoring System
DIACHEX* PRO Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Easy Step Blood Glucose Monitoring System
DIACHEX* PRO Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Easy Step/DIACHEX* PRO Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood using biosensor technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, and forearm, for home or clinical use by persons with diabetes as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis or neonatal testing.
